summary: The diff implements all five requirements comprehensively. REQ-1 (nav tab), REQ-2 (JamaCollectionSection component), REQ-3 (backend endpoints), REQ-4 (AdminPanel with three tabs), and REQ-5 (React Query hooks) are all present. One minor AC item from REQ-3 regarding explicit stable storage declaration is not clearly visible in the truncated backend diff, but the overall implementation appears complete.

missing_requirements.requirement: Records persist across canister upgrades via stable storage
missing_requirements.reason: The backend/main.mo diff is truncated and does not show stable variable declarations for jamaCollectionsList or nextJamaCollectionId. It is unclear whether stable storage is explicitly used for the new Jama Collection data.

hallucinated_features.description: A backend/migration.mo module was added to handle migration of OldAnnouncement to NewAnnouncement (adding an id field), and main.mo uses 'with migration = Migration.run'.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention any migration module or announcement schema migration. This was not requested in any REQ.
